ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Good duo for dungeon play?
ygData.msgSnippet: I have to agree, even tho my shaman is only level 21, I use root on a regular basis (dots hit for full dmg on rooted mobs)  and that way I can do the most
ygData.messageBody:
I have to agree, even tho my shaman is only level 21, I use root on a regular basis (dots hit for full dmg on rooted mobs)  and that way I can do the most damage possible)
 
----- Original Message -----
From: Claude P Perry II
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, June 20, 2002 11:35 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Good duo for dungeon play?

I gotta agree with orion.  Whenver I play my shammy I use root  as a way to
kite the mob ad in my dot spels and a few dd spells and I can just sit back
and relax  med and heal if I need to until the root breaks.  And if you in a
group I kep root up as back up if ther is a drud in the group  in case we
get  trained.


----- Original Message -----
From: "Orion" <orionv@...>


Didn't bother with root?? I have a level 50 Ogre Shaman that STILL uses root
to this day. Get all your spells...you might be surprised how useful they
can be.
